MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA23 postcode area of West Kilbride, affecting properties in Carlung Estate and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm this to replace an electrical pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:43pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
